forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 1pm, then a chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 26. West northwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

sections.header: Bucks Run is closed due to poor conditions and wind damage.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Highly variable, but decent conditions this morning for skate and classic. If you're looking to get out and ski, do it this afternoon; the park has already decided to close for tomorrow. Given how thin the snow coverage is it's doubtful they'll be able to reopen until they spread more snow, and based on past practices, that's unlikely to happen until after New Year . But check anyways in case we get lucky.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments: After a wind hold this afternoon we will open for night skiing. The lifts will spin from 5:30 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. The Grooming Crew is out preparing the slopes and grooming in the fresh snow to improve conditions for this evening. The wind is still up, but is has dropped significantly from this afternoon. Make it a great night at Nub's Nob.
